attributes.action: Take action against ISLAM4UK's march in Wootton Bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the law abiding subjects of The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland appeal to Her Majesty's government to take necessary action to stop the proposed march by islam4uk through the town of Wootton Bassett which would disrespect the memory of those who would fight for the freedom of others, their families and those currently serving within the Armed Forces

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
